title: Where to get sona emote for Odyssey
body:
So who is a content creator that can give sona emote? 

NA is running a community event to give away sona emote, are we doing the same? https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/13OqgY90-contestraffle-for-sona-emote-ccs-odyssey-of-art
